message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a fair price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I understand your perspective, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm glad we're close to a deal! I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny!
I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $130 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement at that amount.
